assignment.title: Create a Basic Generative Script in Google Veo 3
assignment.objective: Develop a basic script within Google Veo 3 to generate a personalized greeting video.
expectedCapabilities: Understand and apply basic script writing
Integrate elements into a coherent video script
assignment.submissionInstructions: Submit a video of your script in action along with the script file within Google Veo 3.

tasks.title: Develop a Custom Script
tasks.description: Create a script that personalizes video messages using Google Veo 3 scripting tools.

steps.title: Initialize a New Project
steps.description: Open Google Veo 3, create a new project, and label it 'Greeting Script'.

steps.title: Script Basic Greetings
steps.description: Write a script to display a personalized greeting based on viewer's input. Use conditionals to alter the greeting message.

steps.title: Integrate Visuals and Sound
steps.description: Add appropriate visual overlays and sound that enhance the video based on script conditions.

checkForUnderstanding.question: What is an essential factor in creating dynamic video scripts?
How does scripting impact video interaction?

subsections.title: Understanding Generative Scripts
subsections.content: In generative AI video creation, scripting is pivotal. Scripts define how AI elements interact to form a cohesive narrative. This subsection explores the purpose and components of generative scripts, emphasizing sequence, flow, and logic.

quizzes.question: What is the primary role of a generative script?

subsections.title: Elements of Script Writing in Google Veo 3
subsections.content: Learn the core elements required when scripting in Google Veo 3. We'll dive into variables, decision trees, and event handling, illustrating each with practical examples that resemble real-world applications.

quizzes.question: Which element is essential for controlling conditional logic?

subsections.title: Practical Script Application
subsections.content: This section brings theory into practice. We'll create a simple script for a dynamic greeting video using Google Veo 3, demonstrating the impact of scripting on video outcomes.

quizzes.question: What scripting element changes video flow dynamically?
